video.title: VeggieTales in the House
video.synopsis: The exciting new adventures of Bob the Tomato, Larry the Cucumber, and all their Veggie friends as you've never seen them before: in the house!

episodes.synopsis: Larry and Laura Carrot want to adopt puppies of their own. The Veggies try to hide from their troubles and each other in Pa Grape’s store.
episodes.title: Puppies & Guppies / Sorry We're Closed Today

episodes.synopsis: Bob thinks having a mustache will change everything. Bob and Larry learn what it means to not go to bed angry.
episodes.title: Bob & The Awesome Frosting Mustache / Bob and Larry: Gettin' Angry

episodes.synopsis: Larry’s bad habits make it hard for Bob to do his new job. Bob and Jimmy want new roommates so they decide to swap and get surprising results.
episodes.title: Bob's Bad Breath / Trading Places

episodes.synopsis: Bob and Larry hatch a scheme to buy a monster truck. Pa Grape warns a freezing cold Petunia not to turn up the heat in his store.
episodes.title: Jimmy & Jerry Are Rich / Feelin Hot, Hot, Hot

episodes.synopsis: Laura thinks she only has to dream she’s a great athlete to be a great athlete. It’s sour grapes for Madame Blueberry when she loses a baking contest.
episodes.title: Laura At Bat / Pie Fight!

episodes.synopsis: Pa Grape adopts Jean Claude so they can compete in the Father-Son Day Celebration games; Larry convinces Petunia to let him take care of her plants.
episodes.title: Pa Grape's Son / Larry's Cardboard Thumb

episodes.synopsis: Bob tries to get his name on the new generosity shelter; Larry and the veggies ignore warnings not to open the air-conditioning vent.
episodes.title: The Gong Heard Round the House / When Dust Bunnies Come to Town

episodes.synopsis: Bob and Larry take Ichabeezer on an adventure, doing things they think he wants to do; Pa Grape asks Madame Blueberry to sing a jingle for his store.
episodes.title: The Bucket List / A Gift For Singing

episodes.synopsis: Larry opens a lemonade stand to raise money -- so he can buy a video game; Junior Asparagus recruits Laura Carrot and Larry to help him build a fort.
episodes.title: Lie-Monade / Let's Build A Fort

episodes.synopsis: Pa Grape asks Larry to let the silly new guy help drive the ice-cream cart; LarryBoy is reluctant to save grumpy Ichabeezer from the nefarious Motato.
episodes.title: Bacon & Ice Cream / For the Honor of LarryBoy

episodes.synopsis: Motato is stealing birthdays with his evil De-Birthday-Ficator; Junior befriends a young "buffalorange," but Ichabeezer wants to capture the animal.
episodes.title: The Birthday Thief / Junior Gets A Pet

episodes.synopsis: Larry gets sunglasses -- and an attitude -- after Jimmy and Jerry Gourd say he's not cool; Larry figures out how to get every comic book ever made.
episodes.title: Cool as a Cucumber / The Rich Young Comic Ruler

episodes.synopsis: Bob, Larry and Madame Blueberry accidentally flood the kitchen with burned popcorn; Motato captures Ichabeezer's beloved dog, Rooney.
episodes.title: Popcorntastrophe / Junior Jetpack

episodes.synopsis: Motato creates a radish super-soldier to hunt down LarryBoy; Junior and his friend Tiny Pea risk danger by sailing in the koi pond all by themselves.
episodes.title: Monster Manners / You, Me, & Tiny Pea

episodes.synopsis: Motato kidnaps pop star Jenna Chive when she visits the Veggie House; Larry finds the perfect toy pirate ship -- just as Ichabeezer loses his.
episodes.title: Jenna Chive Live / Captain LarryBeard
